name: Magnetic Rush (Adria Martinez, Ynobis, Albus, mlgkhush)
name_original: Magnetic Rush (Adria Martinez, Ynobis, Albus, mlgkhush)
description:
Description

Magnetic rush is a game where you control a particle using a magnet. In each level you'll find new challenging mechanics, as attractive/repulsive poles and enemies that will try to get in your way.

Credits: Devs:

Adrià Martinez García 

Diego Mena González(Twitter)

Artists:

Lluis Alcalá Pastor(Instagram)

Alba Bernad Rivero(Instagram)

Note: This game is  from a GameJam from our school and this game has been done in 2 days and one morning
